summary.span: 使用 命名空间可以开发用于读取和管理事件日志的应用程序。

span.span: Using the namespace, you can develop applications that read and manage event logs.

summary.span: 事件日志中的事件包含由特定应用程序、服务或操作系统组件发布的信息、警告或错误。

span.span: An event in an event log contains information, a warning, or an error that has been published by a specific application, service, or operating system component.

summary.span: 这些事件由监视计算机运行状况的应用程序读取，还可以由发生特定事件时执行操作的应用程序读取。

span.span: These events are read by applications that monitor a computer's health and applications that take action when specific events occur.

summary.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅[读取和管理事件日志的技术摘要](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671205.aspx)和[事件日志方案](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671204.aspx)。

span.span: For more information, see [Technology Summary for Reading and Managing Event Logs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671205.aspx) and [Event Log Scenarios](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671204.aspx).
